content: 30 35 39 44 48 56 58 62 sts for the front body slip next 44 48 50 54 62 68 72 80 84 sts on scrap yarn or stitch holder for sleeves cast on 6 6 6 6 6 6 10 12 12 sts for the underarms knit next 70 78 88 98 108 118 124 130 140 sts for the back body slip next 44 48 50 54 62 68 72 80 84 sts on scrap yarn or stitch holder for sleeves cast on 6 6 6 6 6 6 10 12 12 sts for the underarms knit next 43 48 53 59 64 70 68 72 78 sts for the rest of the front body you should have 152 168 188 208 228 248 268 284 304 sts for the body body knit stockinette in the round until garment measures 10 25 cm from the underarms if you wish to customize the length knit until 0 5 1 cm from desired length note that you will need more yarn if you make the garment longer switch to 5 mm needles bind off with a 5-stitch i-cord bind off and graft together the i-cord ends the bind off will add about 0 5 1 cm length to the garment sleeves with 4 5 mm needles return to held sleeve stitches pick up and knit 6 6 6 6 6 6 10 12 12 sts from the cast on edge of the underarm you should have total 50 54 56 60 68 74 82 92 96 sts for one sleeve knit stockinette in the round for 6 row switch to 5 mm needles bind off with a 5-stitch i-cord bind off and graft together the i-cord ends the bind off will add about 0 5 1 cm length to the sleeve repeat for other sleeve wan cheng phua © copyright 2023 knittygrittysg com neck hem with a 5 mm needle starting from the right corner of the back pick up and knit a total of 81 85 85 89 89 93 97 101 105 sts along the neckline if you need a guide for the pick up 29 31 31 33 33 35 35 37 39 sts along the back 5 sts along the lace motif 13 13 13 13 13 13 20 20 20 sts along the side of the front neckline 16 18 18 20 20 22 12 14 16 sts along the cast on edge bottom of the front neckline 13 13 13 13 13 13 20 20 20 sts along the side of the front neckline 5 sts along the lace motif bind off with a 3-stitch i-cord bind off and graft together the i-cord ends lace motif chart also relevant for neckline increases and shoulder increases sections used at both the left and right shoulders which are marked by sm congratulations you are finished tag me on instagram @knittygritty_sg and use the hashtag #picnicfolkstop to share your work i am excited to see all
